name: Dark Journey
description:
The Dark Journey is a multiple ending hardcore survival horror game telling a story of a group of people who lost their way on their hunting journey , ending on a mysterious dark island where they have to survive and find their way out .



Play with up to 7 friends as a group of friends who lost in the sea during a fishing journey , your boat ran out of fuel so you have to find some help on the island , try to escape or fight dangers and discover the dark secret of the island
